ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: "HTML テキストがここに表示されます。"

Rules.InvariantScript:
"data:image/svg+xml;
    utf8,
        "&EncodeUrl("
            <svg
                xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
                width='16'
                height='16' 
                fill='currentColor' 
                class='bi bi-calendar'
                viewBox='0 0 16 16'
            >
                <defs>  
                    <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>  
                        <stop offset='15%' style='stop-color: "& Parent.IconLinealGradient1 &" ;'></stop>  
                        <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "& Parent.IconLinealGradient2 &" ;'></stop>  
                    </linearGradient>  
                </defs>

                <path 
                    fill='url(#gradient)' d='M3.5 0a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5V1h8V.5a.5.5 0 0 1 1 0V1h1a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v11a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H2a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V3a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h1V.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5-.5zM1 4v10a1 1 0 0 0 1 1h12a1 1 0 0 0 1-1V4H1z'
                />
            </svg>
        ")

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: "HTML テキストがここに表示されます。"
"HTML テキストがここに表示されます。"

Rules.InvariantScript:
/*This item is in a row containing no days of the visible month. It is in the row after the row where the last day of the month occurs*/ 
 !(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,TimeUnit.Days) - Weekday(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,TimeUnit.Days)) + 1 > _lastDayOfMonth)

If(
    DateAdd(
        _firstDayInView,
        ThisItem.Value
    )= _dateSelected,
        If(
            'Date Picker'.DarkMode = true,
            Color.WhiteSmoke,
            RGBA(96,96,96,1)
        ),
    DateAdd(
        _firstDayInView,
        ThisItem.Value
    ) = Today(),
        If(
            'Date Picker'.DarkMode = true,
            Color.WhiteSmoke,
            RGBA(96,96,96,1)
        ),
    CurrentDayLabel.Color
)

/*This item is in a row containing no days of the visible month. It is in the row after the row where the last day of the month occurs*/ 
 !(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,TimeUnit.Days) - Weekday(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,TimeUnit.Days)) + 1 > _lastDayOfMonth)

CustomProperties.Name: IconLinealGradient1
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 1番目のグラデーションを指定します(HEX値)

CustomProperties.Name: IconLinealGradient2
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 2番目のグラデーションを指定します(HEX値)

CustomProperties.Name: CalendarVisibility
CustomProperties.Tooltip: カレンダーが表示されている場合はtrueを出力します

CustomProperties.Name: DateSelected
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 選択されている日付を出力します

CustomProperties.Name: DarkMode
CustomProperties.Tooltip: ダークモードを有効にします
